mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM (SELECT * FROM user_role WHERE user_id = #{id}) u LEFT JOIN role r ON (r.id = u.role_id) LEFT JOIN role_power rp ON (r.id=rp.role_id) LEFT JOIN power p ON (p.id=rp.power_id) WHERE p.id is not null
select * from power p where exists(select id from role_power r where r.power_id = p.id and role_id= #{roleId} )
select power.*,p.name as p_name from power left join power p on(power.pid = p.id) where power.pid != 0
